title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Science Education and Classroom Culture through Inquiry-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Elementary Science Curriculum and Fundamental Collaborative Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Teachers can systematically design students’ scientific inquiry processes using blog-based collaborative learning tools
Learners gain experience sharing scientific problem-solving ideas through peer assessment and feedback cycles three or more times
Teachers create a classroom environment where formative assessment tools maintain student participation in collaborative learning at 80% or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
